attributes.action: Make Service providers responsible for eliminating unwanted (Spam) advertising.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Customers sign-up to e-mail accounts in order to send and receive relevant information.
Currently the majority of information sent/received is unwanted advertising, very often of an insuling nature relating to sexual performance/inadequacy, encouragement to gamble,etc, etc.
Service providers should be made responsible for eliminating this unwanted and often insuling material.
